/* Note: sdshdr5 is never used, we just access the flags byte directly.
 * However is here to document the layout of type 5 SDS strings. */
struct __attribute__ ((__packed__)) sdshdr5 {
    unsigned char flags; /* 3 lsb of type, and 5 msb of string length */
    char buf[];
};
struct __attribute__ ((__packed__)) sdshdr8 {
    uint8_t len; /* used */
    uint8_t alloc; /* excluding the header and null terminator */
    unsigned char flags; /* 3 lsb of type, 5 unused bits */
    char buf[];
};
struct __attribute__ ((__packed__)) sdshdr16 {
    uint16_t len; /* used */
    uint16_t alloc; /* excluding the header and null terminator */
    unsigned char flags; /* 3 lsb of type, 5 unused bits */
    char buf[];
};
struct __attribute__ ((__packed__)) sdshdr32 {
    uint32_t len; /* used */
    uint32_t alloc; /* excluding the header and null terminator */
    unsigned char flags; /* 3 lsb of type, 5 unused bits */
    char buf[];
};
struct __attribute__ ((__packed__)) sdshdr64 {
    uint64_t len; /* used */
    uint64_t alloc; /* excluding the header and null terminator */
    unsigned char flags; /* 3 lsb of type, 5 unused bits */
    char buf[];
};

//Â æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ¸…é™¤æŒ‰é’®Â (å½“æœç´¢é¡¹æœ‰é»˜è®¤å€¼æ—¶ï¼Œæ¸…é™¤æŒ‰é’®ä¸æ˜¾ç¤º)
constÂ clearableÂ =Â (column:Â ColumnProps)Â =>Â {

Â Â Â Â searchInitParam:Â {},

Â Â Â Â Â Â console.log("æˆ‘æ˜¯åˆ†é¡µæ›´æ–°ä¹‹åçš„å€¼",Â newVal);
Â Â Â Â },

Â Â //Â åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™éœ€è¦åšçš„äº‹æƒ…å°±æ˜¯Â è®¾ç½®è¡¨å•æŸ¥è¯¢é»˜è®¤å€¼Â &&Â è·å–è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®(resetå‡½æ•°çš„ä½œç”¨åˆšå¥½æ˜¯è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½)

Â Â constÂ updatedTotalParamÂ =Â ()Â =>Â {

Â Â Â Â letÂ nowSearchParam:Â {Â [key:Â string]:Â anyÂ }Â =Â {};

Â Â Â Â forÂ (letÂ keyÂ inÂ state.searchParam)Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â *Â æŸäº›æƒ…å†µä¸‹å‚æ•°ä¸ºÂ false/0Â ä¹Ÿåº”è¯¥æºå¸¦å‚æ•°
Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â state.searchParam[key]Â ||
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â state.searchParam[key]Â ===Â falseÂ ||
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â state.searchParam[key]Â ===Â 0
Â Â Â Â Â Â )Â {

Â Â Â Â Object.assign(

Â Â Â Â );

Â Â /**

Â Â constÂ updatePageableÂ =Â (resPageable:Â Table.Pageable)Â =>Â {

Â Â /**

importÂ {Â ref,Â computedÂ }Â fromÂ "vue";

/**

Â *Â @paramÂ {String}Â selectIdÂ å½“è¡¨æ ¼å¯ä»¥å¤šé€‰æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰€æŒ‡å®šçš„Â id

exportÂ constÂ useSelectionÂ =Â (selectId:Â stringÂ =Â "id")Â =>Â {

Â Â constÂ isSelectedÂ =Â ref<boolean>(false);

Â Â constÂ selectedListÂ =Â ref([]);

Â Â //Â å½“å‰é€‰ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰ids(æ•°ç»„)ï¼Œå¯æ ¹æ®é¡¹ç›®è‡ªè¡Œé…ç½®idå­—æ®µ
Â Â constÂ selectedListIdsÂ =Â computed(():Â string[]Â =>Â {

Â Â Â Â });
Â Â Â Â returnÂ ids;
Â Â });

Â Â //Â è·å–è¡Œæ•°æ®çš„Â Key,ç”¨æ¥ä¼˜åŒ–Â TableÂ çš„æ¸²æŸ“;åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨è·¨é¡µå¤šé€‰æ—¶,è¯¥å±æ€§æ˜¯å¿…å¡«çš„
Â Â constÂ getRowKeysÂ =Â (row:Â any)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â returnÂ row[selectId];

Â Â /**
Â Â Â *Â @descriptionÂ å¤šé€‰æ“ä½œ
Â Â Â *Â @paramÂ {Array}Â rowArrÂ å½“å‰é€‰æ‹©çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
Â Â Â *Â @returnÂ void

Â Â constÂ selectionChangeÂ =Â (rowArr:Â any)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â rowArr.lengthÂ ===Â 0Â ?Â (isSelected.valueÂ =Â false)Â :Â (isSelected.valueÂ =Â true);
Â Â Â Â selectedList.valueÂ =Â rowArr;

Â Â returnÂ {

Â Â Â Â selectedList,

importÂ {Â ElNotificationÂ }Â fromÂ "element-plus";

/**
Â *Â @descriptionÂ æ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®æµç”Ÿæˆblobï¼Œåˆ›å»ºé“¾æ¥ï¼Œä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶
Â *Â @paramÂ {Function}Â apiÂ å¯¼å‡ºè¡¨æ ¼çš„apiæ–¹æ³•(å¿…ä¼ )
Â *Â @paramÂ {String}Â tempNameÂ å¯¼å‡ºçš„æ–‡ä»¶å(å¿…ä¼ )
Â *Â @paramÂ {Object}Â paramsÂ å¯¼å‡ºçš„å‚æ•°(é»˜è®¤ä¸ºç©ºå¯¹è±¡)
Â *Â @paramÂ {Boolean}Â isNotifyÂ æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å¯¼å‡ºæ¶ˆæ¯æç¤º(é»˜è®¤ä¸ºÂ true)
Â *Â @paramÂ {String}Â fileTypeÂ å¯¼å‡ºçš„æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼(é»˜è®¤ä¸º.xlsx)
Â *Â @returnÂ void
Â *Â */

Â Â api:Â (param:Â any)Â =>Â Promise<any>,
Â Â tempName:Â string,

Â Â isNotify:Â booleanÂ =Â true,
Â Â fileType:Â stringÂ =Â ".xlsx"
)Â =>Â {
Â Â ifÂ (isNotify)Â {
Â Â Â Â ElNotification({
Â Â Â Â Â Â title:Â "æ¸©é¦¨æç¤º",
Â Â Â Â Â Â message:Â "å¦‚æœæ•°æ®åºå¤§ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ä¸‹è½½ç¼“æ…¢å“¦ï¼Œè¯·æ‚¨è€å¿ƒç­‰å¾…ï¼",
Â Â Â Â Â Â type:Â "info",

Â Â Â Â });
Â Â }
Â Â tryÂ {
Â Â Â Â constÂ resÂ =Â awaitÂ api(params);
Â Â Â Â constÂ blobÂ =Â newÂ Blob([res]);
Â Â Â Â //Â å…¼å®¹Â edgeÂ ä¸æ”¯æŒÂ createObjectURLÂ æ–¹æ³•
Â Â Â Â ifÂ ("msSaveOrOpenBlob"Â inÂ navigator)Â returnÂ window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob(blob,Â tempNameÂ +Â fileType);
Â Â Â Â constÂ blobUrlÂ =Â window.URL.createObjectURL(blob);
Â Â Â Â constÂ exportFileÂ =Â document.createElement("a");
Â Â Â Â exportFile.style.displayÂ =Â "none";
Â Â Â Â exportFile.downloadÂ =Â `${tempName}${fileType}`;
Â Â Â Â exportFile.hrefÂ =Â blobUrl;
Â Â Â Â document.body.appendChild(exportFile);
Â Â Â Â exportFile.click();
Â Â Â Â //Â å»é™¤ä¸‹è½½å¯¹Â urlÂ çš„å½±å“
Â Â Â Â document.body.removeChild(exportFile);
Â Â Â Â window.URL.revokeObjectURL(blobUrl);
Â Â }Â catchÂ (error)Â {
Â Â Â Â console.log(error);
Â Â }
};

importÂ {Â ElMessageBox,Â ElMessageÂ }Â fromÂ "element-plus";
importÂ {Â HandleDataÂ }Â fromÂ "./interface";

/**
Â *Â @descriptionÂ æ“ä½œå•æ¡æ•°æ®ä¿¡æ¯(äºŒæ¬¡ç¡®è®¤ã€åˆ é™¤ã€ç¦ç”¨ã€å¯ç”¨ã€é‡ç½®å¯†ç ã€‘)
Â *Â @paramÂ {Function}Â apiÂ æ“ä½œæ•°æ®æ¥å£çš„apiæ–¹æ³•(å¿…ä¼ )
Â *Â @paramÂ {Object}Â paramsÂ æºå¸¦çš„æ“ä½œæ•°æ®å‚æ•°Â {id,params}(å¿…ä¼ )
Â *Â @paramÂ {String}Â messageÂ æç¤ºä¿¡æ¯(å¿…ä¼ )
Â *Â @paramÂ {String}Â confirmTypeÂ iconç±»å‹(ä¸å¿…ä¼ ,é»˜è®¤ä¸ºÂ warning)
Â *Â @returnÂ Promise
Â */
exportÂ constÂ useHandleDataÂ =Â <PÂ =Â any,Â RÂ =Â any>(
Â Â api:Â (params:Â P)Â =>Â Promise<R>,
Â Â params:Â Parameters<typeofÂ api>[0],

Â Â Â Â ElMessageBox.confirm(`æ˜¯å¦${message}?`,Â "æ¸©é¦¨æç¤º",Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â confirmButtonText:Â "ç¡®å®š",
Â Â Â Â Â Â cancelButtonText:Â "å–æ¶ˆ",
Â Â Â Â Â Â type:Â confirmType,
Â Â Â Â Â Â draggable:Â true
Â Â Â Â }).then(asyncÂ ()Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â constÂ resÂ =Â awaitÂ api(params);
Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (!res)Â returnÂ reject(false);
Â Â Â Â Â Â ElMessage({
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â type:Â "success",
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â message:Â `${message}æˆåŠŸ!`
Â Â Â Â Â Â });
Â Â Â Â Â Â resolve(true);
Â Â Â Â });
Â Â });
};

<scriptÂ setupÂ lang="ts"Â name="ProTable">

//Â è¡¨æ ¼Â DOMÂ å…ƒç´ 
constÂ tableRefÂ =Â ref<InstanceType<typeofÂ ElTable>>();

Â Â requestApi:Â (params:Â any)Â =>Â Promise<any>;Â //Â è¯·æ±‚è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®çš„apiÂ ==>Â å¿…ä¼ 
Â Â dataCallback?:Â (data:Â any)Â =>Â any;Â //Â è¿”å›æ•°æ®çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ 
Â Â title?:Â string;Â //Â è¡¨æ ¼æ ‡é¢˜ï¼Œç›®å‰åªåœ¨æ‰“å°çš„æ—¶å€™ç”¨åˆ°Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ 
Â Â pagination?:Â boolean;Â //Â æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦åˆ†é¡µç»„ä»¶Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºtrueï¼‰
Â Â initParam?:Â any;Â //Â åˆå§‹åŒ–è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸º{}ï¼‰
Â Â border?:Â boolean;Â //Â æ˜¯å¦å¸¦æœ‰çºµå‘è¾¹æ¡†Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºtrueï¼‰
Â Â toolButton?:Â boolean;Â //Â æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºè¡¨æ ¼åŠŸèƒ½æŒ‰é’®Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºtrueï¼‰
Â Â selectId?:Â string;Â //Â å½“è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®å¤šé€‰æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰€æŒ‡å®šçš„Â idÂ ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºÂ idï¼‰
Â Â searchCol?:Â numberÂ |Â Record<BreakPoint,Â number>;Â //Â è¡¨æ ¼æœç´¢é¡¹Â æ¯åˆ—å æ¯”é…ç½®Â ==>Â éå¿…ä¼ Â {Â xs:Â 1,Â sm:Â 2,Â md:Â 2,Â lg:Â 3,Â xl:Â 4Â }
}

//Â æ¥å—çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶å‚æ•°ï¼Œé…ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼
constÂ propsÂ =Â withDefaults(defineProps<ProTableProps>(),Â {

Â Â pagination:Â true,
Â Â initParam:Â {},

Â Â toolButton:Â true,

});

//Â è¡¨æ ¼å¤šé€‰Â Hooks
constÂ {Â selectionChange,Â getRowKeys,Â selectedList,Â selectedListIds,Â isSelectedÂ }Â =Â useSelection(props.selectId);

//Â è¡¨æ ¼æ“ä½œÂ Hooks
constÂ {Â tableData,Â pageable,Â searchParam,Â searchInitParam,Â getTableList,Â search,Â reset,Â handleSizeChange,Â handleCurrentChangeÂ }Â =
Â Â useTable(props.requestApi,Â props.initParam,Â props.pagination,Â props.dataCallback);

//Â æ¸…ç©ºé€‰ä¸­æ•°æ®åˆ—è¡¨
constÂ clearSelectionÂ =Â ()Â =>Â tableRef.value!.clearSelection();

//Â ç›‘å¬é¡µé¢Â initParamÂ æ”¹åŒ–ï¼Œé‡æ–°è·å–è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
watch(
Â Â ()Â =>Â props.initParam,
Â Â ()Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â getTableList();
Â Â },
Â Â {Â deep:Â trueÂ }
);

//Â æ¥æ”¶Â columnsÂ å¹¶è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå“åº”å¼
constÂ tableColumnsÂ =Â ref<ColumnProps[]>(props.columns);

//Â å®šä¹‰Â enumMapÂ å­˜å‚¨Â enumÂ å€¼ï¼ˆé¿å…å¼‚æ­¥è¯·æ±‚æ— æ³•æ ¼å¼åŒ–å•å…ƒæ ¼å†…å®¹Â ||Â æ— æ³•å¡«å……æœç´¢ä¸‹æ‹‰é€‰æ‹©ï¼‰
constÂ enumMapÂ =Â ref(newÂ Map<string,Â {Â [key:Â string]:Â anyÂ }[]>());
provide("enumMap",Â enumMap);

//Â æ‰å¹³åŒ–Â columnsÂ &&Â å¤„ç†Â tableColumnsÂ æ•°æ®
constÂ flatColumnsFuncÂ =Â (columns:Â ColumnProps[],Â flatArr:Â ColumnProps[]Â =Â [])Â =>Â {
Â Â columns.forEach(asyncÂ colÂ =>Â {
Â Â Â Â ifÂ (col._children?.length)Â flatArr.push(...flatColumnsFunc(col._children));
Â Â Â Â flatArr.push(col);

Â Â Â Â //Â ç»™æ¯ä¸€é¡¹Â columnÂ æ·»åŠ Â isShowÂ &&Â isFilterEnumÂ å±æ€§
Â Â Â Â col.isShowÂ =Â col.isShowÂ ??Â true;
Â Â Â Â col.isFilterEnumÂ =Â col.isFilterEnumÂ ??Â true;

Â Â Â Â ifÂ (!col.enum)Â return;
Â Â Â Â //Â å¦‚æœå½“å‰Â enumÂ ä¸ºåå°æ•°æ®éœ€è¦è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®ï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨è¯¥è¯·æ±‚æ¥å£ï¼Œå¹¶å­˜å‚¨åˆ°Â enumMap
Â Â Â Â ifÂ (typeofÂ col.enumÂ !==Â "function")Â returnÂ enumMap.value.set(col.prop!,Â col.enum);
Â Â Â Â constÂ {Â dataÂ }Â =Â awaitÂ col.enum();
Â Â Â Â enumMap.value.set(col.prop!,Â data);
Â Â });
Â Â returnÂ flatArr.filter(itemÂ =>Â !item._children?.length);
};

//Â æ‰å¹³Â columns
constÂ flatColumnsÂ =Â ref<ColumnProps[]>();
flatColumns.valueÂ =Â flatColumnsFunc(tableColumns.valueÂ asÂ any);

//Â è¿‡æ»¤éœ€è¦æœç´¢çš„é…ç½®é¡¹Â &&Â å¤„ç†æœç´¢æ’åº
constÂ searchColumnsÂ =Â flatColumns.value
Â Â .filter(itemÂ =>Â item.search?.el)
Â Â .sort((a,Â b)Â =>Â (b.search?.orderÂ ??Â 0)Â -Â (a.search?.orderÂ ??Â 0));

//Â è®¾ç½®æœç´¢è¡¨å•çš„é»˜è®¤å€¼
searchColumns.forEach(columnÂ =>Â {
Â Â ifÂ (column.search?.defaultValueÂ !==Â undefinedÂ &&Â column.search?.defaultValueÂ !==Â null)Â {
Â Â Â Â searchInitParam.value[column.search.keyÂ ??Â handleProp(column.prop!)]Â =Â column.search?.defaultValue;
Â Â }
});

//Â åˆ—è®¾ç½®Â ==>Â è¿‡æ»¤æ‰ä¸éœ€è¦è®¾ç½®æ˜¾éšçš„åˆ—
constÂ colRefÂ =Â ref();
constÂ colSettingÂ =Â tableColumns.value!.filter(itemÂ =>Â {
Â Â returnÂ item.isShowÂ &&Â item.typeÂ !==Â "selection"Â &&Â item.typeÂ !==Â "index"Â &&Â item.typeÂ !==Â "expand"Â &&Â item.propÂ !==Â "operation";
});
constÂ openColSettingÂ =Â ()Â =>Â {
Â Â colRef.value.openColSetting();
};

//Â å¤„ç†æ‰“å°æ•°æ®ï¼ˆæŠŠåå°è¿”å›çš„å€¼æ ¹æ®Â enumÂ åšè½¬æ¢ï¼‰
constÂ printDataÂ =Â computed(()Â =>Â {
Â Â letÂ printDataListÂ =Â JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(selectedList.value.lengthÂ ?Â selectedList.valueÂ :Â tableData.value));
Â Â letÂ colEnumListÂ =Â flatColumns.value!.filter(itemÂ =>Â item.enumÂ ||Â (item.propÂ &&Â item.prop.split(".").lengthÂ >Â 1));
Â Â colEnumList.forEach(colItemÂ =>Â {
Â Â Â Â printDataList.forEach((tableItem:Â {Â [key:Â string]:Â anyÂ })Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â tableItem[handleProp(colItem.prop!)]Â =
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â colItem.prop!.split(".").lengthÂ >Â 1Â &&Â !colItem.enum
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ?Â formatValue(handleRowAccordingToProp(tableItem,Â colItem.prop!))
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â :Â filterEnum(handleRowAccordingToProp(tableItem,Â colItem.prop!),Â enumMap.value.get(colItem.prop!),Â colItem.fieldNames);
Â Â Â Â });
Â Â });
Â Â returnÂ printDataList;
});

//Â æ‰“å°è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®ï¼ˆğŸ’¥Â å¤šçº§è¡¨å¤´æ•°æ®æ‰“å°æ—¶ï¼Œåªèƒ½æ‰å¹³åŒ–æˆä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼ŒprintJsÂ ä¸æ”¯æŒå¤šçº§è¡¨å¤´æ‰“å°ï¼‰
constÂ handlePrintÂ =Â ()Â =>Â {
Â Â printJS({
Â Â Â Â printable:Â printData.value,
Â Â Â Â header:Â props.titleÂ &&Â `<divÂ style="display:Â flex;flex-direction:Â column;text-align:Â center"><h2>${props.title}</h2></div>`,
Â Â Â Â properties:Â flatColumns
Â Â Â Â Â Â .value!.filter(
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â itemÂ =>
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â item.isShowÂ &&Â item.typeÂ !==Â "selection"Â &&Â item.typeÂ !==Â "index"Â &&Â item.typeÂ !==Â "expand"Â &&Â item.propÂ !==Â "operation"
Â Â Â Â Â Â )
Â Â Â Â Â Â .map((item:Â ColumnProps)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â field:Â handleProp(item.prop!),
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â displayName:Â item.label
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â };
Â Â Â Â Â Â }),
Â Â Â Â type:Â "json",
Â Â Â Â gridHeaderStyle:
Â Â Â Â Â Â "border:Â 1pxÂ solidÂ #ebeef5;height:Â 45px;font-size:Â 14px;color:Â #232425;text-align:Â center;background-color:Â #fafafa;",
Â Â Â Â gridStyle:Â "border:Â 1pxÂ solidÂ #ebeef5;height:Â 40px;font-size:Â 14px;color:Â #494b4e;text-align:Â center"
Â Â });
};

//Â æš´éœ²ç»™çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶çš„å‚æ•°å’Œæ–¹æ³•(å¤–éƒ¨éœ€è¦ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥ä»è¿™é‡Œæš´éœ²å‡ºå»)
defineExpose({Â element:Â tableRef,Â tableData,Â searchParam,Â pageable,Â getTableList,Â clearSelectionÂ });
</script>

Â Â <componentÂ :is="renderLoop(column)"></component>

<scriptÂ lang="tsx"Â setup>
importÂ {Â inject,Â ref,Â useSlotsÂ }Â fromÂ "vue";
importÂ {Â ElTableColumn,Â ElTagÂ }Â fromÂ "element-plus";
importÂ {Â filterEnum,Â formatValue,Â handleRowAccordingToPropÂ }Â fromÂ "@/utils/util";
importÂ {Â ColumnPropsÂ }Â fromÂ "@/components/ProTable/interface";

constÂ slotsÂ =Â useSlots();

defineProps<{Â column:Â ColumnPropsÂ }>();

constÂ enumMapÂ =Â inject("enumMap",Â ref(newÂ Map()));

//Â æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
constÂ renderCellDataÂ =Â (item:Â ColumnProps,Â scope:Â {Â [key:Â string]:Â anyÂ })Â =>Â {
Â Â returnÂ enumMap.value.get(item.prop)Â &&Â item.isFilterEnum
Â Â Â Â ?Â filterEnum(handleRowAccordingToProp(scope.row,Â item.prop!),Â enumMap.value.get(item.prop)!,Â item.fieldNames)
Â Â Â Â :Â formatValue(handleRowAccordingToProp(scope.row,Â item.prop!));
};

//Â è·å–Â tagÂ ç±»å‹
constÂ getTagTypeÂ =Â (item:Â ColumnProps,Â scope:Â {Â [key:Â string]:Â anyÂ })Â =>Â {
Â Â returnÂ filterEnum(handleRowAccordingToProp(scope.row,Â item.prop!),Â enumMap.value.get(item.prop),Â item.fieldNames,Â "tag")Â asÂ any;
};

constÂ renderLoopÂ =Â (item:Â ColumnProps)Â =>Â {
Â Â returnÂ (
Â Â Â Â <>
Â Â Â Â Â Â {item.isShowÂ &&Â (
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â <ElTableColumn
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â {...item}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â align={item.alignÂ ??Â "center"}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â showOverflowTooltip={item.showOverflowTooltipÂ ??Â item.propÂ !==Â "operation"}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â >
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â {{
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â default:Â (scope:Â any)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (item._children)Â returnÂ item._children.map(childÂ =>Â renderLoop(child));
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (item.render)Â returnÂ item.render(scope);
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (slots[item.prop!])Â returnÂ slots[item.prop!]!(scope);
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (item.tag)Â returnÂ <ElTagÂ type={getTagType(item,Â scope)}>{renderCellData(item,Â scope)}</ElTag>;
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ renderCellData(item,Â scope);
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â },
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â header:Â ()Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (item.headerRender)Â returnÂ item.headerRender(item);
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (slots[`${item.prop}Header`])Â returnÂ slots[`${item.prop}Header`]!({Â row:Â itemÂ });
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ item.label;
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â </ElTableColumn>
Â Â Â Â Â Â )}
Â Â Â Â </>
Â Â );
};
</script>
